comments.content:
FWIW, I see this on current nova, trying to run unit tests.
I tried manually running the apt-get shown in the patch in the comemnt by Gary Kotton and it had no apparent effect (though it installed two packages.)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~barnold-8

comments.content:
Same result. Running

     run_tests.sh -f

to recreate the virtual environment fails. The log output is here http://paste.openstack.org/show/95171/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~daniel-genin

comments.content: Working again with the most recent master e83d2d39.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~daniel-genin

comments.content:
I'm using devstack on Ubuntu  
$ lsb_release -idrc 

Distributor ID: Ubuntu
Description:    Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS
Release:        14.04
Codename:       trusty

I carried out 
$ sudo apt-get install pkg-config
and 
$ sudo apt-get install libvirt-dev

as reported in the patch...
It works for me!!!!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~matarazzoangelo
